Name: DisplayText
Description: Text to be displayed by the instrument. Supports the use of DynamicText. Note that when using Dynamic Text, the full DisplayText must be repeated for multi-language versions of the content. Different languages may handle the dynamic portions in different locations and/or with different content. Therefore languages cannot be mixed within a dynamic text except when the full text itself has multiple language sections, for example, a foreign language term in a text. The DisplayText may also be repeated to provide a dynamic and plain text version of the display. This allows for accurate rendering of the display in a non-dynamic environment like print.
